title: Enchanting Emerald & Diamond Choker Haar: A Timeless Elegance
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant shine. Features brilliant-cut diamonds (VVS clarity
G color) and two stunning pear-shaped Emeralds of exceptional quality. Adorned with natural South Sea pearls.
features: This exquisite choker features a delicate filigree design studded with dazzling diamonds. The central emeralds add a touch of regal sophistication. Dainty pearl drops enhance the femininity and elegance of the piece. Modern interpretation of a classic Haaram, perfect for contemporary sensibilities.
occasions: and other special occasions. A stunning statement piece for any grand celebration or formal event. Suitable for both traditional Telugu functions and modern gatherings.
description: This choker combines the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry with a modern aesthetic. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds ensure lasting brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a rich, lustrous finish. A perfect blend of tradition and modernity, making it a treasured heirloom piece.
